job.title: Azure Data Engineer
job.description:
Our Client is looking for an "Azure Data Engineer"&nbsp;for contract positions. Please review the Job descriptions below and let us know if you are&nbsp;interested and fit for any of the jobs.&nbsp;   Please apply at ravinder@vsvwins.com, 510 560 4649 // raghav@vsvwins.com, 302 648 1257   Job Description:  - Project Duration: 12-month contract with a chance to extend   
  - Project Location: Richmond, VA (Can be Remote)   
  - It's a W2/1099 Position.   
   Technical MUST haves:&nbsp;  - Pyspark/Python, writing streaming applications into a production Enterprise environment.   
  - Rest API Design and Development   
  - Azure Data Bricks, Configuration, Notebooks development, and Delta Tables processing   
  - SQL in Azure   
  - Microsoft Azure   
• Logic App• Function Apps• Resource Management• Agile Delivery Framework  - Proven experience with Agile and Waterfall SDLC methodologies.   
  - Excellent systems requirement documentation skills   
  - Proven ability to deliver results.   
   Nice to Have Experience:  - Experience with Continuous Integration Continuous Development (CICD) is a plus   
  - Experience with Test-Driven Development (TDD) is a plus   
   Roles and Responsibilities:  - Follows direction set by the ETL Development Lead when developing ETL solutions.   
  - Works with Systems Analysts in designing, testing, and implementing ETL solutions.   
  - Works as part of a larger development team that includes other internal and external ETL developers.   
  - Responsible for the development, testing, and maintenance of ETL solutions.   
  - Participates in unit testing and data quality efforts within assigned data domain.   
  - Creates and maintains appropriate documentation.   
  - Must be able to troubleshoot and identify the root cause of production issues.   
  - Demonstrate detailed knowledge of legacy systems, Atlas systems, data structures/usage and primary systems interfaces based on appropriately written system specifications.   
   If you are interested or have references please apply at ravinder@vsvwins.com, 510 560 4649 // raghav@vsvwins.com, 302 648 1257.   Regards,Ravi ChandelVSVWINS INC.
